content.question: Which of the following twentieth-century developments most directly weakened European colonial states and contributed to the changes between the two maps?

choices.label: The decline of European economies during the Great Depression
Japanese occupation of Southeast Asia during the Second World War
Competition between Great Britain and France
The conquest of Spanish imperial territories by the United States

content.answer: Japanese occupation of Southeast Asia during the Second World War

topic.text: 7.5: Unresolved Tensions after World War I

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
